title: Thanks to Lee Glover for your Help! Video of Journey in Chapter 12 of Reading ZaMM
description: Thank you, Lee Glover for putting this video together about the journey in Chapter 12 of Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance: https://youtu.be/OEf_gT7kuF4

transcript_parts.text: [Music]
hi there so I mentioned previously that
this channel doing this channel is
opened up my experience to the input and
help and feedback from people who have
much more knowledge of piercings work
than I do they've had much longer
relationships with his philosophy with
his books it's you know it's been
guiding their lives for a lot longer
than it has mine so this has been an
incredible learning and connecting
experience for me so one of these one of
these people one of these viewers has
allowed me to introduce him to you so
this is lee glover and he made the zen
and the art of motorcycle maintenance
journey himself in 2008 he purchased a
1964 Superhawk motorcycle off of
Craigslist so he not only followed the
route but he did so on a very similar
motorcycle used by piercing so Leah
shared a lot about his journey and the
subsequent research and follow-up of
this journey with me and it was
profoundly meaningful in ways that are
almost unimaginable so I hope that
someday he will come on this channel to
share that because the story is is
really incredible
Lee's helped me a lot in my quest to
understand piercings work in general but
in one particular area he's really been
helpful and that's to understand the
route itself for example the topography
the history of the places they visit the
significance of the places and many more
layers of meaning pertaining to these
places there are some metaphysical
qualities in the actual land itself that
continue to give us meaning as Americans
and as human beings we are ensconced in
awesome greatness in this country so
here are some pictures
of Lee on his motorcycle and during his
follow-up research he met with John
Sutherland I had had it spent some time
and did an interview with him so here's
a picture of him with John Sutherland so
it was Lee who gave me that information
about Beartooth pass that I shared in
Chapter 11 and who's good and I used
these quotes about it Lee's also a
filmmaker who took a lot of footage
during his Zen in the art of motorcycle
maintenance trip and the subsequent
follow-up visits to some of those areas
and he's kindly put together a 13 minute
clip of the journey that they take in
Chapter 12 so I'm going to put a link
for that below and in that link in the
description he's going to explain the
footage so you're going to know what
you're looking at and watch it all the
way through because you really need to
see where they end up it's it's going to
really significantly enhance your
enjoyment of reading these chapters so
I'm very grateful to Lee and all he's
shared with me and hopefully you'll see
him here one day but in the meantime I'm
sure that the content here is going to
continue to be enriched by his generous
willingness to share his insights his
photos and his videos with me so I hope
that made sense and I will see you next
you
